254580.「舞踏会に参加するんですって！？ \n それなら この私の出番じゃない！:
I hear you're going to the ball! Then it's my
turn!

254581.「舞踏会といったら ダンスよ！ \n 今のゼクレス社交界では イケてるダンスを\:
And when I say ball, I mean dance! In today's
Zechres society, the star of the show is the
one who can dance the hottest dance moves!

254583.「どうせ アンタ 今までダンスなんて \n 習ったことないんでしょ？\n そんな:
You've never taken a dance class before, have
you? You're gonna be so embarrassed!

254584.「あっ！ そうだ！ \n この前 うちのパーティーに来た踊り子で\n 結構 い:
Ah! That's right!  There was a dancer who came
to our party the other night who had a pretty
good set.

254585.「アンタ その踊り子に ダンスを \n 習ってきなさいな！ たしか ファラザード:
You should learn to dance from that dancer! I
think she's from the bazaar in Farazard.

254586.「そうか……。 \n 誰よりもパーティーにくわしい 君が\n そう言うなら 確か:
Well... if you know more about parties than
anyone else, I guess you're right.

254587.「……それはそうと どうして 君がここに？ \n 大魔王城に 何か用があるのかな:
Well...for that matter, why are you here? Do
you have some business at Great Demon King's
castle?

254588.「えっ……ええ！ そうよ！\n 特別に このみすぼらしい城の内装を\n 私が コ:
Eh... yeah! Yes! I thought I'd do you the
honor of coordinating the interior of this
shabby castle!

254589.「大魔王城が 完成したっていうから \n 見にきてみたら どこもかしこも問題外よ:
I heard that Great Demon King's castle was completed, so I came to check it out but everything is out of order. This one needs my
guidance in good taste!

254590.「でも……それは また今度ね。\n 舞踏会のこと すっかり 忘れてたわ。\n 今:
But...that's for another time. I totally
forgot about the ball. I have to reschedule
today and go to the esthetic salon!

254591.「いい？ ちゃんとファラザードの踊り子から\n ダンスを習ってくるのよ？ 冴えな:
Okay? You're gonna have to learn to dance from the dancers of Farazard, okay? If you dance like that, even the Great Demon King will
pinch you!

254592.「それじゃ おふたりとも\n ごきげんよう。舞踏会で会いましょう。:
Well then, good day to you both. See you at
the ball.

254602.「この度は お忙しい中 私ども \n ゼクレス貴族主催の舞踏会に 参加してくださ:
Thank you for taking time out of your busy
schedule to attend the ball hosted by us
noblemen of Zechres...Great Demon King's Ball.

254603.「ふむ……じつに 威厳に満ちた装いですな。 \n その ご立派な衣装に 見合うだ:
Hmmm...you are indeed dressed with dignity. I
hope you will show us a prestige commensurate
with your splendid costume.

254604.「ははん……さすがは大魔王様だ！ \n なんともユニークで 野趣あふれる装いです:
Hahaha...you are indeed the Great Demon King!
What a unique and wild outfit. We could never
duplicate such a thing!

254605.「私どもの舞踏会では もっとも高貴な方に\n 最初のダンスを お願いするのが\n:
In our ball, it is our tradition to ask the
most noble to dance first.

254606.「大魔王様ほどの 高貴なお方でしたら\n さぞかし 優雅なダンスを\n 披露して:
If he is as noble as the Daima King, I'm sure
he will perform a graceful dance!

254607.「ささっ！ まずは 大魔王様から \n 踊ってくださいませ！: Quickly! Please start with Great Demon King!

254608.「どこの馬の骨とも知れぬ 下等魔族が\n 大魔王を名乗るなんて \n なんて 恥:
How shameless for a lowly demon from nowhere
to call himself Great Demon King...

254609.「舞踏会まで ノコノコやってくるなんて……\n どうせ ダンスもろくに踊れない:
I can't believe she's going to the ball, she's
a country girl who can't even dance.

254610.「ほんと……。\n 無様をさらして 泣いて帰るがいいわ。:
Really... you can go home in tears, looking
like a fool.

254611.「君なら 絶対に大丈夫だ。\n 会得したダンスを 堂々と 踊ればいい。:
You'll be absolutely fine. You can dance the
dance you've mastered with dignity.

254612.<pc>は 無心になって\n心に浮かぶダンスを 踊ってみた！:
<pc> is a mindless, mindless dance
that comes to mind!

254613.「ぷっ……！！\n あははははははは！\n ダメ！ もう我慢できない！:
Pfft...! Ha-ha-ha-ha! No! No! I can't take it
anymore!

254614.「そんな動き 初めて見たわ！\n なんて斬新で クセになる動きなの！:
I've never seen that move before! What an
original and addictive move!

254615.「な なんだ あのダンスは……？\n あまりに 珍妙すぎるぞ……。: What's with that dance...? It's too strange...

254616.「ふむ……さすがは 大魔王さま……。: Hmmm... as expected of the Great Demon King...

254618.「……あの舞は まさしく！ \n 古の文献の中に 見られるという\n 始まりの大:
That dance... that dance! The dance by the Great Demon King of the Beginning, which can be found in ancient writings... the dance of
victory!

254619.「<pc>様は この舞踏会で \n かの魔王のように 偉大な王にならんとする\n:
At this ball, <pc> danced to express
his determination to become as great a king as
the Demon King!

254620.「歴史への深き知識と それを実践する胆力！\n まさに 真の指導者に ふさわしい:
A deep knowledge of history and the courage to
put it into practice! The behavior of a true
leader! Berunto, you are an inspiration!

254621.「あ？ ああ！\n た……確かに あれは その……なんとやらだ！\n 私には 最:
Oh? Ah! It's... it's... it's something! I knew
it all along!

254622.「もっ もちろん 私もだとも！ \n さすがは 博識な 大魔王様だ！:
Of course I'm with you! As expected of the
learned Great Demon King!

254623.「ふふっ……。 \n どうやら 貴族たちを 納得させたようだね。\n 君なら 必:
Well... it looks like you've convinced the
nobles. I knew you could do it.

259572.こうして 舞踏会は\nゼクレス貴族たちの 大喝采の中で\n幕を閉じた……。:
And so the ball ended with a great ovation
from the Zechres nobility...

263315.そして <pc>とアスバルは\n大魔王城に 戻った！:
And <pc> and Asbal returned to the
Great Demon King's castle!
